subject: Re: Software question . . .
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
Judy, privately e-mail me with your info and i will ship a copy out to 
you.  That's what i use and also have others using it, there is no 
better program for going over files out there at this time.  Once you 
receive it, i will talk you through it on how to get the best out the 
program.

-Steve H.



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "judy_in_hollywood" 
<Ticket_to_Heaven@...> wrote:
>
> Hi All, Can someone tell me if it's possible, for one of you who has 
the software - for a laptop - to make a copy of the CD-rom (like Cool 
Edit Pro 2.1 or Audacity, EVPMaker, or Audition 1.0)????  I don't know 
where to find these. It probably would help me "bring-out" the EVP's to 
be "clearer"and heard better. My next step. Thanks  =Judy=
>
